Reviews.Title: Defective does not work
Reviews.Author: A. Loomis "AL"
Reviews.Content: Although a great idea I purchased 6 of these camers's,the directions were horribly written,the camera doesn't record correctly there is no motion sensor that works at all, & if it does record at all it does less than 1 min. maybe 20 seconds then quits or it will record for a second & flickers. Terriblly made. Don't waste you money on it. Trying 6 of them hoping maybe 1 or 2 were defective but all 6 did the same thing.They need to go back to the drawing board & start from scratch. The area to put in the SD card on the back where the space is I have very tiny fingers & it was an effort to get that in then you have to use tweezers to pull it back out of the camera, again poorly designed, If you want it just for a clothing hook that is the only value of this item. I would have given it 0 stars but you had to put at least 1 to review.

Reviews.Title: Clothes hook camera
Reviews.Author: Atv9249
Reviews.Content: I really wish I had not wasted my money on this..  While both of the cams I bought did work..  The field of view is terrible..  Trying to get the settings right was hard enough.  And the motion detection really don't work..  It will record once , when you first turn it on then after that 90% of the time it won't turn back on. My opinion is this..  Spend the extra and get something that works the way it's supposed to.  By the way the clothes hook is like 5 inches long..  Don't even make sense for it to be so big...

Reviews.Title: Does not work!
Reviews.Author: Jogeesh "Nam"
Reviews.Content: This item came with poor English instructions and is no help knowing how to use the "long press button".  I have still not been able to get it set in the motion detect mode or the non-motion dectect.  Frustrating!!

Reviews.Title: It doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Neely
Reviews.Content: Bought it - got it - had to search on line for instructions, because none came with it.  The piece to attach it to the wall didn't come with it.  It's completely useless.  It doesn't do anything.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: House Dragon "purplelady36201"
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems at all with this and would recommend it to anyone needing to keep a private eye on things.  Works great outside,unless it is too close to a bright light.  I haven't caught the things I bought it for, however I have some great clips of the cats that I wouldn't have other wise!!!

Reviews.Title: Ok product for the price
Reviews.Author: Christian Faure
Reviews.Content: Doesn't seem to start recording when there is movement.  I have it in my garage and I get a few videos and then not so much.  Ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: Owful
Reviews.Author: Terry A. Marmash
Reviews.Content: I wasted my time and didn't get a credit they replaced it with an even worth than the first one thanks again for the time killing .

Reviews.Title: High Quality Box; Junk Inside.
Reviews.Author: Joseph G.
Reviews.Content: 1. Fully charge the battery before every use.2. 2-3 hour motion activation video capture window; then needs fully re-charge battery whether or not motion triggered video was created.3. No means to add larger battery/life capacity or auxiliary power.4. Picture quality as expected at this price.Best English manual at:[...]
